title: English Language Familiarization Quiz - Medium Difficulty
description: Enhance your English skills with this quiz focusing on sentence construction, vocabulary, and common expressions.
instructions: Write your answer in English, focusing on correct usage and grammar.

items.question: Complete the sentence with the correct form of the verb: 'She ___ (to go) to the market every Sunday.'
What is the meaning of the idiom 'It's raining cats and dogs'?

Complete the sentence with a suitable preposition: 'She is good ___ painting.'
Choose the correct word: 'I can't hear you. Could you speak ___ (louder/loudly)?'
What does the expression 'Break a leg' mean in English?
Fill in the blank with the correct form of the adjective: 'This is the ___ (good) cake I have ever eaten.'
What is the plural form of 'child'?
Rewrite the sentence in the future tense: 'She writes a letter.'
